name: Athletica Fitâ„¢
description: Our signature 45-minute HIIT strength and conditioning class, combining high reps, strength exercises, cardio, and plyometrics for an ultimate athletic conditioning workout. Expect expert coaching, high energy, and a fun yet challenging session designed to push your limits and elevate your performance. This is Athletica.

name: Cycle - The Zone
description: Step into The Zone and embark on a one-of-a-kind cycling experience that takes you on an exhilarating journey of strength and stamina. Powered by science-backed programming that guides you through different heart rate zones, get ready to tackle speed, distance and power challenges through dynamic HIIT and endurance blocks. From EMOMs to AMRAPs and everything in between, each ride is designed to elevate your fitness, break barriers and help you to become stronger and faster than ever before. With no distractions, it's just you, the bike and the road ahead. It's time to get in The Zone.

name: Reformer: Signature
description:
REFORMER: SIGNATURE
Open to all levels of fitness.

This class offers a fresh take on traditional Pilates, combining core strengthening, flexibility, and spinal mobility in a dynamic setting. Participants can expect to engage in strength and resistance training on the Reformer bed, all while enjoying a playful atmosphere. The focus is on improving posture, enhancing the mind-body connection, and developing balance, while specifically targeting the arms and legs for a well-rounded workout. Everyone is welcome, and knowledgeable trainers are available to assist with equipment setup and ensure that all movements are performed safely and effectively.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to Reformer.

staff.bio:
Sienna’s love of health and fitness started at the tender age of 4 when she discovered gymnastics and decided that was her jam. She trained and competed intensely for the next 9 years as an artistic gymnast reaching level 10 status and training with the Olympic squad, before delving into the world of professional rollerblading. She is honored to have been one of the athletes to compete in the first EXTREME Games in Australia where she placed 3rd female in the world on street skating and 7th in the world for vertical ramp.
 
For the past 10 years Sienna has taught all things group fitness and personal training, (Diploma in both) along side being a qualified Pilates Reformer instructor. Sienna loves to bring the fun and the burn to each and every class she teaches with a strong focus on form and technique.

staff.bio:
Jack started his fitness journey in the UK before taking on the Australian dream. When you join his class, you’re joining a tribe.
 
Whether it's pushing you through that last rep or through your fatigue barrier, Jack is the Athletica King in Newtown.

name: Cycle - Beatbox
description:
Beatbox isn’t just a workout—it’s a party on the bike. Ride to the rhythm, move with the music, and lose yourself in the beat. Tracks are choreographed to challenge endurance, strength, and speed while keeping the energy high. With immersive lights, powerful sound, and an electrifying atmosphere, this class turns cycling into an experience. Clip in, feel the music, and let the ride take over.
 
From 27th September, we’re turning things up a notch! 
We’ll now be including one track with dumbbells to build upper body strength and make the experience even more dynamic.

name: Pumpâ€™d
description: Our signature barbell class that targets all major muscle groups in the body. Using light to moderate weights with lots of repetitions, you’ll work through a range of exercises like weighted squats, push-ups, lunges and overhead presses.

staff.bio: As senior Trainer of SpinCity™ with 10+ years experience in fitness, Colleen is a true representation of the energiser bunny, in her element when in a room full of members of varying fitness levels all working together for a common goal (she’s also been known to convert many anti-cardio’ers).

name: Yoga Flow
description:
Yoga: Flowstate
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology permitted in the studio for all yoga classes.

Recommended for students with prior Yoga experience. This dynamic Vinyasa-style class links breath with movement through creative sequences that build strength, flexibility, and focus. You’ll be guided through flowing transitions and opportunities to explore more challenging variations. Each teacher brings their own approach, so the flow may vary in pace and intensity.

name: Badass
description: Focusing on the lower body, this highly targeted class will get you lifting heavier and give you a gravity-defying tight butt. Anything from sled pushes, goblet squats, weighted lunges, team spirit & more. Time to get down.

staff.bio: Jose is one of our original coaches who joined the founding crew at Surry Hills in 2014. His favourite kind of training is an old school lower body lifting session in a class environment with banging tunes, heavy weights and team spirit.

name: Reformer: Athletic
description:
REFORMER: ATHLETIC

Not suitable for pre/post-natal participants or complete beginners to the Reformer.

This full-body cardio workout on the Reformer is designed to get your heart rate up and engage your entire body. Combining signature exercises with high-intensity interval training (HIIT), the class features three main cardio intervals that target both upper and lower body muscles. Set to energetic music and guided with clear instructions, it’s a fast-paced, dynamic session that’s as challenging as it is fun. Expect to work hard and leave feeling invigorated and energised.

Please arrive 5-10 minutes early, especially if you’re new to the Reformer.

name: Yoga Calm
description:
Yoga: Calm
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology permitted in the studio for all yoga classes.

A gentle yoga practice designed to cultivate balance and harmony - physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually. Through slow, deliberate movements and long-held stretches, you’ll release tension, target deep tissues and joints, and move inward with breath awareness and mindfulness. Each session becomes a meditative journey that deepens your connection to your body and spirit while exploring yoga’s core movements and essence.

name: Barre HIIT
description:
Barre HIIT
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A high-energy, faster-paced take on our classic Barre class. This dynamic workout fuses dance, Pilates and low-impact cardio bursts to spike your heart rate, sculpt your muscles and strengthen your core. Expect bold beats, 3–4 cardio intervals and powerful plank work mixed with resistance bands, Pilates balls and weights, all designed to push your limits and leave you feeling energised and strong.

name: Cycle - Squad
description: Squad is all about teamwork, and next-level performance. Using advanced bike tech and an interactive display, you’ll ride together, push limits, and chase milestones as a team. Every pedal stroke drives progress, turning individual effort into collective success.

name: Mat Pilates Strong
description:
This is a more advanced Pilates class that focuses on correct alignment, deep (deep) core activation & spinal mobility all on the mat. Experience more complicated holds and a variety of props to challenge you.

Please note there is a 5 minute lockout rule which applies to all Wellness Classes, including Pilates The instructor will not admit anyone who tries to enter the class after 5 minutes of it commencing. The is due to safety and to prevent disruption in the class.

name: POWER PILATES
description:
POWER PILATES
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

Must have completed at least 2-3 Mat Pilates classes prior.

This advanced, full-body session blends the core principles of traditional Pilates with intensified sequences, pushing your Pilates practice to the next level. Advanced layers and resistance equipment are paired with intermittent cardio bursts to sculpt, tone and elevate your endurance and power.

staff.bio: Shannon brings 18 years of dynamic movement expertise, having danced professionally, instructed fitness and yoga, and guided meditation & breathwork. With a day job as a Psychotherapist specialising in the nervous system and somatic therapies, she brings a unique blend of expertise and enthusiasm to her work, blending her diverse background to cultivate mind-body-soul connections in her classes. Shannon's infectious good vibes, fun energy, and killer playlists make her class sessions an inspiring and enjoyable experience.

name: Reformer: Jump Board (lower body)
description:
REFORMER: JUMP BOARD (lower body)
Open to all levels of fitness. Not suitable for pre/post-natal.

The Reformer Jump Board class offers an engaging Pilates workout that combines low-impact cardio with dynamic movements. Participants use an additional board at the end of the Reformer bed to perform a variety of bouncing and leaping exercises, targeting the lower body while minimizing stress on the joints.

Throughout the session, the "Jump it out" segments elevate the heart rate and enhance overall cardiovascular fitness, making the class both fun and challenging. This format encourages participants to engage their entire body while focusing on strength and endurance.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Strong
description: Based around the competitive sport of Strongman, this high-energy class incorporates free weights, tyres, rope pulls, farmer’s carry, atlas stones (and more!) to achieve maximum strength results.

name: Yoga Strength
description:
Yoga: Empower
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology permitted in the studio for all yoga classes.
 
Prior Yoga experience is highly recommended. Not suitable for pre/post natal. This energising, strength-focused yoga class is designed for intermediate to advanced yogis who want to challenge their body and elevate their practice. With dynamic sequencing, purposeful holds, and an emphasis on building strength, endurance, and mental resilience. You'll cultivate inner power and leave feeling strong, focused, and ready for whatever lies ahead. Pace and intensity may vary as each teacher brings their unique approach.

Expect improved posture, balance and flexibility as you flow through rhythmic moves that leave you feeling strong, lengthened and invigorated.

name: Infrared Pilates
description:
Infrared Pilates
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage. Not suitable for pre/post natal.

A full-body Pilates workout enhanced by the healing power of infrared heat. As you move through strength, core stability and toning exercises, the gentle warmth (24–28 °C) increases circulation, eases muscle tension and improves flexibility. Perfect for all fitness levels, this low-impact, high-reward class leaves you feeling rejuvenated, balanced and energised.

staff.bio:
Maggie’s love for fitness and wellness started at an early age in the world of dance. After travelling the world as a professional dancer, she now shares her passion for Yoga and Pilates through her teaching where she aims to inspire self development through the Mind, Body and Soul.

Focusing on the importance of connecting the mind to movements, breath work and alignment creating balance and harmony throughout all classes.

staff.bio:
Tess is a veteran of the Sydney fitness scene and started with One Playground in 2015! Throughout her journey in movement, Tess has trained and taught in many schools of movement including barre, Pilates, personal training, and functional movement. Tess offers an open minded and varied approach to her teaching. Tessa offers you space to feel and discover in her classes.

An avid techno lover, Exercise Physiology student and Yogi - Tess creates an experiential environment to relax and connect to your body in.

description: Our signature 45-minute HIIT strength and conditioning class, combining high reps, strength exercises, cardio, and plyometrics for an ultimate athletic conditioning workout. Expect expert coaching, high energy, and a fun yet challenging session designed to push your limits and elevate your performance. This is Athletica.

name: Barre Signature
description:
Barre Signature
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A dynamic blend of Pilates and dance-inspired moves set to energising playlists. Working at the barre and on the mat, you’ll sculpt and strengthen your arms, core, thighs and glutes with deep muscle work, low-impact cardio and light weights. Expect improved posture, balance and flexibility as you flow through rhythmic moves that leave you feeling strong, lengthened and invigorated.

staff.bio: Michael is a certified Yoga and Barre Instructor, with a background as a professional performer. He toured the Philippines, Dubai, Indonesia, Malaysia & Singapore with the Children’s Theatre, was a dancer in Baz Lurrhman’s The Great Gatsby and worked as ensemble touring with Mamma Mia! The Musical and The Wizard of Oz.

name: Reformer: Flex (upper body)
description:
REFORMER: FLEX (upper body)
Open to all levels of fitness.

The Reformer: Flex class focuses on targeting and toning the upper body and core. This session is designed to enhance strength, flexibility, and mobility in the arms, shoulders, chest, and back using the Pilates Reformer, light weights, and a TheraBand. Participants will engage in dynamic exercises that emphasize resistance training and functional movement patterns. By incorporating various spring tensions and props, the class challenges the muscles in different ways, promoting strength building, improved posture, and increased body awareness.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

staff.bio:
Jaclyn started practicing Pilates in 2018 and instantly fell in love with the way it made her body and mind feel. What was initially a personal obsession quickly transpired into a new career path. In 2021 she completed her Reformer Pilates training with Body Mind Life Studio.
 
Jaclyn believes that Pilates can be life-changing, and the most beneficial gift you can give your body. She has a distinctive style and loves to offer creative variations on traditional Pilates exercises. In her classes she endeavours to encourage and energise clients to push themselves to reach their fitness goals. She loves that anyone – young, old injured, triathlete, pre-natal & post-natal – can enjoy long-term benefits from Pilates.
 
Jaclyn's classes are challenging, creative, inspiring and, most importantly, FUN! you'll be sure to break a sweat as well as have a laugh.

name: Barre HIIT
description:
Barre HIIT
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A high-energy, faster-paced take on our classic Barre class. This dynamic workout fuses dance, Pilates and low-impact cardio bursts to spike your heart rate, sculpt your muscles and strengthen your core. Expect bold beats, 3–4 cardio intervals and powerful plank work mixed with resistance bands, Pilates balls and weights, all designed to push your limits and leave you feeling energised and strong.

name: Reformer: Strong
description:
REFORMER: STRONG

Not suitable for pre/post-natal participants or complete beginners to the Reformer.

This advanced Reformer class focuses on challenging exercises that build on existing Pilates skills. Participants will engage with heavier resistance, dynamic upper body movements, and cardio intervals designed to push their limits. The class is for those who enjoy lifting heavier weights and want to focus on strength and form on the Reformer bed, while exploring a more intense repertoire of Reformer Pilates exercises. 

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to Reformer.

name: Mat Pilates Signature
description:
Open to all levels of fitness.

This is your go-to for an exciting, new fusion of traditional Pilates and contemporary techniques. Immerse yourself in a transformative workout as we seamlessly blend classic Pilates methods with modern exercises to create a dynamic and engaging session that always delivers. From core-strengthening movements to dynamic stretches, each exercise is meticulously designed to enhance flexibility, improve posture, and build total-body strength and awareness.

With a full-body focus on targeting core strength, glutes, arms and abs, you'll feel the burn and the benefits of every movement. Don't miss out on this invigorating journey to strengthen, tone, define and transform your whole body from the inside out, on the mat.


Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

Participants use an additional board at the end of the Reformer bed to perform a variety of bouncing and leaping exercises, targeting the lower body while minimizing stress on the joints.

Throughout the session, the "Jump it out" segments elevate the heart rate and enhance overall cardiovascular fitness, making the class both fun and challenging. This format encourages participants to engage their entire body while focusing on strength and endurance.

description:

Open to all levels of fitness. Recommended to take 1-3 Origins classes if you haven't done Reformer prior.

Reformer Origins is designed as an introductory class for those new to Pilates or for those looking to enhance their skills on the Reformer. This session focuses solely on the Reformer bed, providing a straightforward and educational experience. Newcomers will find a welcoming atmosphere that supports their learning, while more experienced practitioners can use this class to refine and perfect their technique. It serves as a solid foundation for anyone interested in exploring the benefits of Reformer Pilates.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to Reformer.

name: Infrared Pilates
description:
Infrared Pilates
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage. Not suitable for pre/post natal.

A full-body Pilates workout enhanced by the healing power of infrared heat. As you move through strength, core stability and toning exercises, the gentle warmth (24–28 °C) increases circulation, eases muscle tension and improves flexibility. Perfect for all fitness levels, this low-impact, high-reward class leaves you feeling rejuvenated, balanced and energised.

description: Power Pilates is a high-energy, full-body workout designed to build strength, tone muscles, and improve flexibility. Focusing on core activation and controlled movements, this class combines classic Pilates principles with dynamic, power-infused exercises to challenge your body and boost endurance. Expect to sweat, feel the burn, and leave stronger and more centered in this advanced Mat work session. Perfect for those looking to sculpt, tone, and increase overall strength with an extra boost of intensity.

name: BODYSCULPT
description:
BODYSCULPT
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A powerful fusion of contemporary Mat Pilates and strength training. Expect controlled, challenging exercises designed to build strength, enhance muscle definition and leave you feeling toned from head to toe.

name: Reformer: Flex (upper body)
description:
REFORMER: FLEX (upper body)
Open to all levels of fitness.

The Reformer: Flex class focuses on targeting and toning the upper body and core. This session is designed to enhance strength, flexibility, and mobility in the arms, shoulders, chest, and back using the Pilates Reformer, light weights, and a TheraBand. Participants will engage in dynamic exercises that emphasize resistance training and functional movement patterns. By incorporating various spring tensions and props, the class challenges the muscles in different ways, promoting strength building, improved posture, and increased body awareness.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Fight Club
description: A technique-focused fight class. Come with us on a journey of progression as you work to find your fierce. This is high-intensity interval training using Boxing & Kickboxing techniques, defence & focus pads. Please bring your own gloves, wraps are highly recommended.

staff.bio:
Joey is our very own Mr Motivator. Joey is a Certified Boxing & Muay Thai instructor, specialising in boxing fitness, technique & conditioning.
 
No matter how hard a workout may seem, Joey believes the pleasure of success always surpasses the pain of failure. If you haven't yet seen him, you've surely heard his laugh bursting through the gyms.

description:
Mat Pilates

Open to all fitness levels, this invigorating mat-based session blends classic Pilates techniques with contemporary moves for a fresh, full-body workout. Expect core-strengthening exercises, dynamic stretches and targeted work for your glutes, arms and abs - all designed to improve posture, boost flexibility and build total-body strength. You’ll feel the burn and leave toned, defined and energised from the inside out.

description: Our signature 45-minute HIIT strength and conditioning class, combining high reps, strength exercises, cardio, and plyometrics for an ultimate athletic conditioning workout. Expect expert coaching, high energy, and a fun yet challenging session designed to push your limits and elevate your performance. This is Athletica.

name: Barre Signature
description:
Barre Signature
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A dynamic blend of Pilates and dance-inspired moves set to energising playlists. Working at the barre and on the mat, you’ll sculpt and strengthen your arms, core, thighs and glutes with deep muscle work, low-impact cardio and light weights. Expect improved posture, balance and flexibility as you flow through rhythmic moves that leave you feeling strong, lengthened and invigorated.

name: BODYSCULPT
description:
BODYSCULPT
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage.

A powerful fusion of contemporary Mat Pilates and strength training. Featuring three sculpting intervals targeting arms, core and lower body, this hybrid session uses heavier weights and ankle weights to intensify each move. Expect controlled, challenging exercises designed to build strength, enhance muscle definition and leave you feeling toned from head to toe.

name: Mat Pilates Signature
description:
Open to all levels of fitness.

This is your go-to for an exciting, new fusion of traditional Pilates and contemporary techniques. Immerse yourself in a transformative workout as we seamlessly blend classic Pilates methods with modern exercises to create a dynamic and engaging session that always delivers. From core-strengthening movements to dynamic stretches, each exercise is meticulously designed to enhance flexibility, improve posture, and build total-body strength and awareness.

With a full-body focus on targeting core strength, glutes, arms and abs, you'll feel the burn and the benefits of every movement. Don't miss out on this invigorating journey to strengthen, tone, define and transform your whole body from the inside out, on the mat.


Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Mat Pilates Strong
description:
This is a more advanced Pilates class that focuses on correct alignment, deep (deep) core activation & spinal mobility all on the mat. Experience more complicated holds and a variety of props to challenge you.

Please note there is a 5 minute lockout rule which applies to all Wellness Classes, including Pilates The instructor will not admit anyone who tries to enter the class after 5 minutes of it commencing. The is due to safety and to prevent disruption in the class.

name: Reformer: Athletic
description:
REFORMER: ATHLETIC

Not suitable for pre/post-natal participants or complete beginners to the Reformer.

This full-body cardio workout on the Reformer is designed to get your heart rate up and engage your entire body. Combining signature exercises with high-intensity interval training (HIIT), the class features three main cardio intervals that target both upper and lower body muscles. Set to energetic music and guided with clear instructions, it’s a fast-paced, dynamic session that’s as challenging as it is fun. Expect to work hard and leave feeling invigorated and energised.

Please arrive 5-10 minutes early, especially if you’re new to the Reformer.

name: Cycle - Beatbox
description:
Beatbox isn’t just a workout—it’s a party on the bike. Ride to the rhythm, move with the music, and lose yourself in the beat. Tracks are choreographed to challenge endurance, strength, and speed while keeping the energy high. With immersive lights, powerful sound, and an electrifying atmosphere, this class turns cycling into an experience. Clip in, feel the music, and let the ride take over.
 
From 27th September, we’re turning things up a notch! 
We’ll now be including one track with dumbbells to build upper body strength and make the experience even more dynamic.

name: Power Pilates
description: Power Pilates is a high-energy, full-body workout designed to build strength, tone muscles, and improve flexibility. Focusing on core activation and controlled movements, this class combines classic Pilates principles with dynamic, power-infused exercises to challenge your body and boost endurance. Expect to sweat, feel the burn, and leave stronger and more centered in this advanced Mat work session. Perfect for those looking to sculpt, tone, and increase overall strength with an extra boost of intensity.

name: Cycle - Squad
description: Squad is all about teamwork, and next-level performance. Using advanced bike tech and an interactive display, you’ll ride together, push limits, and chase milestones as a team. Every pedal stroke drives progress, turning individual effort into collective success.

name: Cycle - The Zone
description: Step into The Zone and embark on a one-of-a-kind cycling experience that takes you on an exhilarating journey of strength and stamina. Powered by science-backed programming that guides you through different heart rate zones, get ready to tackle speed, distance and power challenges through dynamic HIIT and endurance blocks. From EMOMs to AMRAPs and everything in between, each ride is designed to elevate your fitness, break barriers and help you to become stronger and faster than ever before. With no distractions, it's just you, the bike and the road ahead. It's time to get in The Zone.

description:
REFORMER: ORIGINS

Open to all levels of fitness. Recommended to take 1-3 Origins classes if you haven't done Reformer prior.

Reformer Origins is designed as an introductory class for those new to Pilates or for those looking to enhance their skills on the Reformer. This session focuses solely on the Reformer bed, providing a straightforward and educational experience. Newcomers will find a welcoming atmosphere that supports their learning, while more experienced practitioners can use this class to refine and perfect their technique. It serves as a solid foundation for anyone interested in exploring the benefits of Reformer Pilates.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to Reformer.

name: Reformer: Signature
description:
REFORMER: SIGNATURE
Open to all levels of fitness.

This class offers a fresh take on traditional Pilates, combining core strengthening, flexibility, and spinal mobility in a dynamic setting. Participants can expect to engage in strength and resistance training on the Reformer bed, all while enjoying a playful atmosphere. The focus is on improving posture, enhancing the mind-body connection, and developing balance, while specifically targeting the arms and legs for a well-rounded workout. Everyone is welcome, and knowledgeable trainers are available to assist with equipment setup and ensure that all movements are performed safely and effectively.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to Reformer.

name: Athletica Fitâ„¢
description: Our signature 45-minute HIIT strength and conditioning class, combining high reps, strength exercises, cardio, and plyometrics for an ultimate athletic conditioning workout. Expect expert coaching, high energy, and a fun yet challenging session designed to push your limits and elevate your performance. This is Athletica.

name: Cycle - Beatbox
description:
Beatbox isn’t just a workout—it’s a party on the bike. Ride to the rhythm, move with the music, and lose yourself in the beat. Tracks are choreographed to challenge endurance, strength, and speed while keeping the energy high. With immersive lights, powerful sound, and an electrifying atmosphere, this class turns cycling into an experience. Clip in, feel the music, and let the ride take over.
 
From 27th September, we’re turning things up a notch! 
We’ll now be including one track with dumbbells to build upper body strength and make the experience even more dynamic.

name: Infrared Yoga
description:
Infrared Yoga
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology permitted in the studio for all yoga classes. Not suitable for pre/post natal or beginners.

Step into the heat with this powerful Vinyasa practice held under infrared warmth. Designed for experienced practitioners, Infrared Yoga combines flow, dynamic sequencing, longer holds, and mindful breathwork to challenge both body and mind. The infrared environment enhances circulation, flexibility, and detoxification, amplifying the physical intensity of the practice. Expect to sweat, strengthen, and expand your limits.

name: Step Up Dance
description:
This is Step Up - A dynamic and engaging Dance class designed to be both fun and accessible for all participants. 
 
Each session begins with a warm-up to prepare the body for dancing. This includes stretching and light cardio to get the blood flowing. A routine-based Learning sequence the follows. The core of the class focuses on learning a routine whether that be a chorus of a song or intermission piece. These routines are designed to be straightforward and repetitive, ensuring you can easily pick up the moves.
 
Step Up is perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a fun and lively Dance workout whilst letting go and learning a new routine along the way.

name: Calisthenics
description: Discover the benefits of strength training, using only body weight exercises to achieve a full body workout. Push, pull, climb and balance as you progress through a range of skills targeting the major muscle groups. No experience needed.

staff.bio:
Nathan has lived, trained, performed and coached in over 50 cities around the world. He has extensive knowledge in gymnastics, dance, Pilates, yoga and martial arts.

Nathan loves helping people move better. His classes improve technique, educate and inspire growth with One Playground members. With Nathan’s diverse background, no goal is out of reach.


Nathan has used all the skills he has learned to become a stunt man for film.
He is passionate about helping and meeting like-minded individuals; if you have an interest, don't hesitate to say hello or ask questions.

name: Cycle - Squad
description: Squad is all about teamwork, and next-level performance. Using advanced bike tech and an interactive display, you’ll ride together, push limits, and chase milestones as a team. Every pedal stroke drives progress, turning individual effort into collective success.

name: Infrared Pilates
description:
Infrared Pilates
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology usage. Not suitable for pre/post natal.

A full-body Pilates workout enhanced by the healing power of infrared heat. As you move through strength, core stability and toning exercises, the gentle warmth (24–28 °C) increases circulation, eases muscle tension and improves flexibility. Perfect for all fitness levels, this low-impact, high-reward class leaves you feeling rejuvenated, balanced and energised.

name: Strong
description: Based around the competitive sport of Strongman, this high-energy class incorporates free weights, tyres, rope pulls, farmer’s carry, atlas stones (and more!) to achieve maximum strength results.

name: Reformer: Flex (upper body)
description:
REFORMER: FLEX (upper body)
Open to all levels of fitness.

The Reformer: Flex class focuses on targeting and toning the upper body and core. This session is designed to enhance strength, flexibility, and mobility in the arms, shoulders, chest, and back using the Pilates Reformer, light weights, and a TheraBand. Participants will engage in dynamic exercises that emphasize resistance training and functional movement patterns. By incorporating various spring tensions and props, the class challenges the muscles in different ways, promoting strength building, improved posture, and increased body awareness.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Athletica Fitâ„¢

Expect expert coaching, high energy, and a fun yet challenging session designed to push your limits and elevate your performance. This is Athletica.

name: Hip Hop
description:
Get ready to groove to the beat in our Hip Hop class, where the energy is high, the music is loud, and the moves are street-style cool. Join a community of friendly dancers as we turn up the volume and let loose on the dance floor.

In this class, it's not about nailing every move perfectly – it's about letting go of inhibitions and getting into the rhythm of the music. Leave your worries at the door and dive headfirst into the experience, feeling the music pulse through your body and igniting your inner dancer.

No prior dance experience is necessary – just bring your enthusiasm and be ready to move.

name: Mat Pilates Signature
description:
Open to all levels of fitness.

This is your go-to for an exciting, new fusion of traditional Pilates and contemporary techniques. Immerse yourself in a transformative workout as we seamlessly blend classic Pilates methods with modern exercises to create a dynamic and engaging session that always delivers. From core-strengthening movements to dynamic stretches, each exercise is meticulously designed to enhance flexibility, improve posture, and build total-body strength and awareness.

With a full-body focus on targeting core strength, glutes, arms and abs, you'll feel the burn and the benefits of every movement. Don't miss out on this invigorating journey to strengthen, tone, define and transform your whole body from the inside out, on the mat.


Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Reformer: Jump Board (lower body)
description:
REFORMER: JUMP BOARD (lower body)
Open to all levels of fitness. Not suitable for pre/post-natal.

The Reformer Jump Board class offers an engaging Pilates workout that combines low-impact cardio with dynamic movements. Participants use an additional board at the end of the Reformer bed to perform a variety of bouncing and leaping exercises, targeting the lower body while minimizing stress on the joints.

Throughout the session, the "Jump it out" segments elevate the heart rate and enhance overall cardiovascular fitness, making the class both fun and challenging. This format encourages participants to engage their entire body while focusing on strength and endurance.

Arrive 5-10 minutes early. Especially if you're new to the class.

name: Yoga Calm
description:
Yoga: Calm
5-minute lock-out policy. No technology permitted in the studio for all yoga classes.

A gentle yoga practice designed to cultivate balance and harmony - physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually. Through slow, deliberate movements and long-held stretches, you’ll release tension, target deep tissues and joints, and move inward with breath awareness and mindfulness. Each session becomes a meditative journey that deepens your connection to your body and spirit while exploring yoga’s core movements and essence.

name: Reformer: Athletic
description:
REFORMER: ATHLETIC

Not suitable for pre/post-natal participants or complete beginners to the Reformer.

This full-body cardio workout on the Reformer is designed to get your heart rate up and engage your entire body. Combining signature exercises with high-intensity interval training (HIIT), the class features three main cardio intervals that target both upper and lower body muscles. Set to energetic music and guided with clear instructions, it’s a fast-paced, dynamic session that’s as challenging as it is fun. Expect to work hard and leave feeling invigorated and energised.

Please arrive 5-10 minutes early, especially if you’re new to the Reformer.

name: Fiesta
description:
Step into the vibrant world of Fiesta Dance, where rhythm and passion collide in a celebration of movement and music.
 
This exhilarating class (formerly Carnivale), is inspired by the electrifying energy of festival beats, blending dynamic dance styles such as Samba, Salsa, Merengue, Reggaeton, and more.

Led by our expert instructors, you'll embark on a journey through Latin and Caribbean dance traditions, learning exciting choreography that will ignite your spirit and awaken your senses. 

No prior dance experience is necessary – just come ready to let loose, shake your hips, and have a blast on the dance floor.

name: Mobility
description: This class works on improving your motions across multiple planes of movement. Request areas to work on and release those nagging pulls to free up your body, achieving a greater range of movement to dominate your workouts and more functional movements day to day.
